items.title: Multibaggers: 5 Nifty500 stocks that doubled in just 7 months – Are you invested?
items.summary: In the first seven months of FY26, the Indian stock market witnessed an impressive rally, with nearly half of the Nifty500 stocks delivering double-digit returns. Fourteen standout stocks surged between 70% and 140%, defying global uncertainties. Among them, five stocks more than doubled investors’ wealth, including Netweb Technologies, Gujarat Mineral Development Corporation, and Force Motors. Despite strong gains, a few still trade below their 52-week highs, highlighting the market’s resilience and potential for further growth.

VANAHA aims to offer residents a harmonious living experience.

items.title: Tariffs, Trump & fragile markets: Port Shelter’s Richard Harris warns investors of ‘unknown shocks’ ahead

items.title: Balance is everything: LGT Wealth’s Chirag Doshi recommends barbell strategy for fixed income investors
items.summary: Chirag Doshi of LGT Wealth India advises a barbell strategy for fixed income investors. This approach combines short-term, high-quality bonds for stability with longer-duration assets for potential gains. Diversification across maturity and credit quality is key. Investors should focus on carry over market timing. This balanced approach helps manage risk and optimize returns in the current evolving interest rate environment.
